
                            
                            <p>首卡2万，苹果分期占了1万多额度，每月存刷太受罪了，刚看放水，申请秒过。请问二卡消费3万也免年费吗，果 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202412/31/084956x1le7zef7kn7nqfe.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202412/31/084956x1le7zef7kn7nqfe.jpg"> <br>  <br> </p>
